content: Hi, my name is Ashot. What's your name and how old are you today?
Hi Ashot, my name is Rachel. I am 25 years old. Can you tell me about a time when you provided exceptional customer service and went above and beyond to help a customer?

Hi Ashot, my name is Rachel. I'd rather not disclose my age, but I have several years of experience in retail. Can you tell me about a time when you had to handle a difficult customer and how you resolved the situation?
